articles.description: MILLIONS of Android fans will soon lose access to some hugely popular apps that are getting banned from the Google Play Store. Here's which applications are affected by the new block.

articles.title: PS5 UK: PlayStation 5 restock efforts continue following 2020 sales success - Express
articles.description: THE PS5 sold more consoles than the PS4 in the UK in 2020, but gamers are still struggling to find PlayStation 5 restock options.
